application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents
application.label: unknown

div.p: In this proposal the PI and collaborators requested beamtime to analyse unique paired orthopyroxene -garnet inclusions in diamonds in order to produce an independent oxybarometer.

Unfortunately, this proposal was not funded, however, the PI will consider reapplying for beam time, given that these samples are absolutely unique and can significantly improve our understanding of the oxidation state of the mantle.
